verses.verse: And it came <S%H1961><s%> about in the sixth <S%H8345><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> on the fifth <S%H2568><s%> [day] of the sixth <S%H8345><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> as I was sitting <S%H3427><s%> in my house <S%H1004><s%> with the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> sitting <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, that the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3068><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on me there. <S%H8033><s%>

Then I looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> a likeness <S%H1823><s%> as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of a man; <S%H784><s%> from His loins <S%H4975><s%> and downward <S%H4295><s%> [there was] the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of fire, <S%H784><s%> and from His loins <S%H4975><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of brightness, <S%H2096><s%> like the appearance <S%H5869><s%> of glowing <S%H2830><s%> metal. <S%H2830><s%>

And He stretched <S%H7971><s%> out the form <S%H8403><s%> of a hand <S%H3027><s%> and caught <S%H3947><s%> me by a lock <S%H6734><s%> of my head; <S%H7218><s%> and the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> lifted <S%H5375><s%> me up between <S%H996><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> and heaven <S%H8064><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> me in the visions <S%H4759><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> to the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> [court,] where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the seat <S%H4186><s%> of the idol <S%H5566><s%> of jealousy, <S%H7068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> provokes <S%H7065><s%> to jealousy, <S%H7065><s%> was [located.]

And behold, <S%H2009><s%> the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> [was] there, <S%H8033><s%> like the appearance <S%H4758><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> in the plain. <S%H1237><s%>

Then He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> raise <S%H5375><s%> your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the north. <S%H6828><s%>" So I raised <S%H5375><s%> my eyes <S%H5869><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the north, <S%H6828><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> to the north <S%H6828><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> [was] this <S%H2088><s%> idol <S%H5566><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> at the entrance. <S%H872><s%>

And He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> you see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> they are doing, <S%H6213><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> are committing <S%H6213><s%> here, <S%H6311><s%> that I should be far <S%H7368><s%> from My sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>? But yet <S%H5750><s%> you will see <S%H7200><s%> still <S%H7725><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> abominations. <S%H8441><s%>"
Then He brought <S%H935><s%> me to the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> and when I looked, <S%H7200><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> a hole <S%H2356><s%> in the wall. <S%H7023><s%>

And He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> dig <S%H2864><s%> through the wall. <S%H7023><s%>" So I dug <S%H2864><s%> through the wall, <S%H7023><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> an entrance. <S%H6607><s%>
And He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Go <S%H935><s%> in and see <S%H7200><s%> the wicked <S%H7451><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> that they are committing <S%H6213><s%> here. <S%H6311><s%>"

So I entered <S%H935><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> form <S%H8403><s%> of creeping <S%H7431><s%> things <S%H7431><s%> and beasts <S%H929><s%> [and] detestable <S%H8263><s%> things, <S%H8263><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the idols <S%H1544><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> were carved <S%H2707><s%> on the wall <S%H7023><s%> all <S%H5439><s%> around. <S%H5439><s%>

And standing <S%H5975><s%> in front <S%H6440><s%> of them were seventy <S%H7657><s%> elders <S%H2205><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> with Jaazaniah <S%H2970><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphan <S%H8227><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them, each <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> with his censer <S%H4730><s%> in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and the fragrance <S%H6282><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%> of incense <S%H7004><s%> rising. <S%H5927><s%>

Then He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> do you see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H834><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> are committing <S%H6213><s%> in the dark, <S%H2822><s%> each <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> in the room <S%H2315><s%> of his carved <S%H4906><s%> images <S%H4906><s%>? For they say, <S%H559><s%> 'The Lord <S%H3068><s%> does not see <S%H7200><s%> us; the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has forsaken <S%H5800><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>'"

And He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Yet <S%H5750><s%> you will see <S%H7200><s%> still <S%H7725><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they are committing. <S%H6213><s%>"

Then He brought <S%H935><s%> me to the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the Lord's house <S%H1004><s%> which <S%H834><s%> [was] toward <S%H413><s%> the north; <S%H6828><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> women <S%H802><s%> were sitting <S%H3427><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> weeping <S%H1058><s%> for Tammuz. <S%H8542><s%>

And He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Do you see <S%H7200><s%> [this,] son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>? Yet <S%H5750><s%> you will see <S%H7200><s%> still <S%H7725><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> these. <S%H428><s%>"

Then He brought <S%H935><s%> me into the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s house. <S%H1004><s%> And behold, <S%H2009><s%> at the entrance <S%H6607><s%> to the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the porch <S%H197><s%> and the altar, <S%H4196><s%> [were] about twenty-five men <S%H376><s%> with their backs <S%H268><s%> to the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the Lord and their faces <S%H6440><s%> toward the east; <S%H9506><s%> and they were prostrating <S%H7812><s%> themselves eastward <S%H9506><s%> toward the sun. <S%H8121><s%>

And He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Do you see <S%H7200><s%> [this,] son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>? Is it too light <S%H7043><s%> a thing <S%H7043><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> to commit <S%H6213><s%> the abominations <S%H8441><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they have committed <S%H6213><s%> here, <S%H6311><s%> that they have filled <S%H4390><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> with violence <S%H2555><s%> and provoked <S%H3707><s%> Me repeatedly <S%H7725><s%>? For behold, <S%H2009><s%> they are putting <S%H7971><s%> the twig <S%H2156><s%> to their nose. <S%H639><s%>

"Therefore, I indeed <S%H1571><s%> shall deal <S%H6213><s%> in wrath. <S%H2534><s%> My eye <S%H5869><s%> will have <S%H2347><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> pity <S%H2347><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> shall I spare; <S%H2550><s%> and though they cry <S%H7121><s%> in My ears <S%H241><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice, <S%H6963><s%> yet I shall not listen <S%H8085><s%> to them."
